executable.title: Cal_Complexity
executable.description: This command line calculate the local shape complexity using EMD.

file.name: InputSurface
file.label: Input MNI obj(*.obj) or VTK(*.vtk) surface file
file.description: Input surface data MNI obj or VTK surface file

file.name: InputTemplateSurface
file.label: Template surface MNI obj(*.obj) or VTK(*.vtk) surface file
file.description: Template surface model would be calculated surface area and used for local or global scaled EMD

float.name: KernelSize
float.label: kenel size of shape Index
float.description: radius of kernel size using geodesic distance (in mm)

integer.name: StepSize
integer.label: define the number of bin
integer.description: the number of bin subdivided for shape index (1->3bins, 2->5bins, 3->9bins, .... , 6-> 65bins, 7-> 129bins ....)

boolean.name: scaleLSA
boolean.label: scaled local surface area
boolean.description: kernel size scaling with local surface area. Provide expected template surface model. Kenel size is scaled by k' = k*(input_SAi/template_SAi), i is vertex.

boolean.name: scaleGSA
boolean.label: scaled global surface area
boolean.description: kernel size scaling with global surface area. Provide expected template surface model. Kenel size is scaled by k' = k*[sum(input surface area)/sum(template surface area)]
